Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Harrison/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted WB: Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison; EB: Congress Parkway, Kostner, Jackson, Cicero and Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Harrison and Kolmar, due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Cicero, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison

Eastbound buses will operate via Congress Parkway, Kostner, Jackson, Cicero and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Sawyer
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted WB via 79th, Western, 87th, Pulaski and 79th; EB via 79th, Pulaski, 87th, Kedzie and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Sawyer.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near due to street blockage near 79th/Sawyer.

  • Westbound buses will operate via 79th, Western, 87th, Pulaski and 79th.
  • Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Pulaski, 87th, Kedzie and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
